title: Pong
description: Pong game created in Javascript. User must click on screen to begin game. The game will continue until the the user or cpu allow a ball to go past them. Then the user must click again game to restart the game with updated score.

title: Unearth
description: Discover Hiking Trails, Restaraunts, Hotels, and Transit Near Any Location in the United States.

title: Giphy
description: jQuery project where users can create and click on buttons to render ten of their favorite memes.
